title: Timpanogos Cave National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 10 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Hike with a Ranger      Time: 11:00 AM Location: Meet on visitor center deck to hike cave trail Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/12/2016 to 09/04/2016 Hike the Timpanogos Cave trail with a ranger, learning as you go View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Guided Nature Walk at Cascade Springs      Location: Cascade Springs Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/11/2016 to 09/03/2016 Join us at 11am for a guided Nature Walk at Cascade Springs on the Uinta-Wasatch-Cache National Forest.  View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument The Archaic Peoples of our Past      Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Step back in time and explore the ancient people that once inhabited Utah Valley and American Fork Canyon. View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Junior Ranger program: Spiders - Weavers and Predators      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Become a Timpanogos Cave Junior Ranger. Attend a program designed just for kids to meet requirements to earn your patch or badge.  View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Who's that Walking through the Woods?       Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Visitor Center  Fees: Free     Friday, August 26, 2016 Enjoy an evening of fun learning about and then creating your very own animal tracks to take home! View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Junior Ranger program: Fossils!      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Come celebrate the Centennial and earn your Junior Ranger badge while Ranger Roberta teaches us about Fossils and Dinosaurs.  View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument On the fly- Bats! Winged Creatures of the Night      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 A bat's flying ability has inspired and awed throughout history. Come learn about this amazing creature. View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Camping Basics      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, September 2, 2016 Get ready to enjoy America's great outdoors! This canyon is the perfect place for first time and seasoned campers. Topics covered will include gear, preparation, setup, and camping etiquette. View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Junior Ranger Program: Bears      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Celebrate the Centennial and earn your Junior Ranger badge while learning about Bears with Ranger Roberta. View Details      Timpanogos Cave National Monument Jr Ranger program - Moon, Stars, and Constellations      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Monday, September 5, 2016 Come celebrate the Centennial, earn your Junior Ranger badge and learn with Ranger Roberta about the things we see in the night sky View Details
